questions.prompt: Complete the sentence: 'She _______ (visit) the museum yesterday.'
Complete the sentence: 'I _______ (see) that movie three times already.'
Complete the sentence: 'They _______ (not finish) their project yet.'
Complete the sentence: '_______ you ever _______ (try) sushi?'
Complete the sentence: 'He _______ (live) in this city for five years now.'
Complete the sentence: 'I _______ (not see) him since last week.'
Complete the sentence: 'She _______ (read) that book already.'
Complete the sentence: 'We _______ (travel) to Europe many times.'
Complete the sentence: '_______ they _______ (finish) their homework yet?'
Complete the sentence: 'He _______ (not eat) breakfast this morning.'
